description: This file provides a function to create and manage a WebSocket connection for real-time chat updates, including setup for open, message, close, and error events.

methods.name: createChatSocket({ path = "/ws/chat/", onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError })
methods.description: Creates and returns a WebSocket connection configured with callbacks for message receipt, connection open, close, and error events.

ctags.name: createChatSocket
ctags.pattern: /^export function createChatSocket({ path = "\/ws\/chat\/", onMessage, onOpen, onClose, onError })/
